assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Jubilant Pharmova Limited operates as an integrated pharmaceutical company worldwide. It operates through three segments: Pharmaceuticals; Drug Discovery & Development Solutions; and Proprietary Novel Drugs. The Pharmaceuticals segment engages in the manufacturing and supply of allergy therapy products, contract manufacturing of sterile injectables and non-sterile products, active pharmaceutical ingredients, and solid dosage formulations, as well as sale of radiopharmaceuticals through a network of 49 radio pharmacies in the United States. The Drug Discovery & Development Solutions segment provides collaborative research services to pharmaceutical innovators. The Proprietary Novel Drugs segment develops therapies in the areas of oncology and auto-immune disorders. The company was formerly known as Jubilant Life Sciences Limited and changed its name to Jubilant Pharmova Limited in February 2021. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Noida, India.
